segment.source: Create Package Page
segment.target: Create Package Page

segment.source: Create Package Page
segment.target: Create Package Page

segment.source: Create Package Page
segment.target: Create Package Page

segment.source: Use the Create Package page to add optional comments and to specify where the package will be saved.
segment.target: Use the Create Package page to add optional comments and to specify where the package will be saved.

segment.source: You can also specify whether the package should be compressed.
segment.target: You can also specify whether the package should be compressed.

segment.source: After you have configured the options on this page, click Create to create the new virtual application package.
segment.target: After you have configured the options on this page, click Create to create the new virtual application package.

segment.source: This page contains the following elements:
segment.target: This page contains the following elements:

segment.source: Comments
segment.target: Comments

segment.source: Add optional comments that will be associated with the new virtual application package.
segment.target: Add optional comments that will be associated with the new virtual application package.

segment.source: The comments that you add help identify the purpose or version of the virtual application package.
segment.target: The comments that you add help identify the purpose or version of the virtual application package.

segment.source: Save Location
segment.target: Save Location

segment.source: Click Browse and specify to which location you want to save the package (.sprj file).
segment.target: Click Browse and specify to which location you want to save the package (.sprj file).

segment.source: Compress Package
segment.target: Compress Package

segment.source: Select the Compress Package check box to compress the package, which can help enhance package streaming to target computers.
segment.target: Select the Compress Package check box to compress the package, which can help enhance package streaming to target computers.

segment.source: We recommend that you select this option for packages that are larger than 4 GB.
segment.target: We recommend that you select this option for packages that are larger than 4 GB.

segment.source: The current uncompressed package size is also displayed.
segment.target: The current uncompressed package size is also displayed.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If the original package size is more than 4 GB and compressed, by default, the checkbox is checked and cannot be changed.
segment.target: If the original package size is more than 4 GB and compressed, by default, the checkbox is checked and cannot be changed.

segment.source: If the original package is compressed and less than 4 GB, the check box is checked, but can be cleared.
segment.target: If the original package is compressed and less than 4 GB, the check box is checked, but can be cleared.

segment.target: Related topics
